description: Puts a new capacity assignment configuration for a specified capacity reservation. If a capacity assignment configuration already exists for the capacity reservation, replaces the existing capacity assignment configuration.

parameters.name: CapacityReservationName
parameters.description: The name of the capacity reservation to put a capacity assignment configuration for.

parameters.name: CapacityAssignments
parameters.description: The list of assignments for the capacity assignment configuration. (dict) --- A mapping between one or more workgroups and a capacity reservation. WorkGroupNames (list) --- The list of workgroup names for the capacity assignment. (string) ---

nested_params.name: WorkGroupNames
nested_params.description: The list of workgroup names for the capacity assignment.
